mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase (purchase_no, user_id, ticket_no, tid, purchase_method_type, item_name, purchase_date, purchase_price, purchase_count, tran_code, qr_code_image, qr_code_result) VALUES (seq_purchase_purchase_no.nextval, #{user.userId:VARCHAR}, #{ticket.ticketNo:NUMERIC}, #{tid:VARCHAR}, #{purchaseMethodType:VARCHAR}, #{itemName:VARCHAR}, #{purchaseDate:DATE}, #{purchasePrice:NUMERIC}, #{purchaseCount:NUMERIC}, #{tranCode:VARCHAR}, #{qrCode.qrCodeImage:VARCHAR}, #{qrCode.qrCodeResult:VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT pc.purchase_no AS purchase_no, u.user_id AS user_id, u.nickname AS nickname, t.ticket_no AS ticket_no, f.festival_no AS festival_no, f.festival_name AS festival_name, p.party_no AS party_no, p.party_name AS party_name, p.party_image AS party_image, pc.tid AS tid, pc.purchase_method_type AS purchase_method_type, pc.item_name AS item_name, pc.purchase_date AS purchase_date, pc.purchase_price AS purchase_price, pc.purchase_count AS purchase_count, pc.tran_code AS tran_code, pc.qr_code_image AS qr_code_image, pc.qr_code_result AS qr_code_result FROM users u, festival f, party p, ticket t, purchase pc WHERE pc.ticket_no = t.ticket_no AND pc.user_id = u.user_id AND t.festival_no = f.festival_no(+) AND t.party_no = p.party_no(+) AND pc.delete_flag IS NULL AND pc.purchase_no = #{value}

SELECT u.user_id AS user_id, u.nickname AS nickname ,t.ticket_no AS ticket_no ,f.festival_name AS festival_name ,f.addr AS addr, f.start_date AS start_date, f.end_date AS end_date, f.festival_image AS festival_image ,pc.purchase_no AS purchase_no, pc.tid AS tid, pc.purchase_count AS purchase_count ,pc.purchase_price AS purchase_price, pc.tran_code AS tran_code ,pc.item_name AS item_name FROM users u, festival f, ticket t, purchase pc WHERE pc.user_id = u.user_id AND pc.ticket_no = t.ticket_no AND t.festival_no = f.festival_no AND u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id AS user_id, u.nickname AS nickname ,t.ticket_no AS ticket_no ,p.party_name AS party_name, p.party_date AS party_date ,p.party_place AS party_place, p.party_image AS party_image ,pc.purchase_no AS purchase_no, pc.tid AS tid, pc.purchase_count AS purchase_count ,pc.purchase_price AS purchase_price, pc.tran_code AS tran_code ,pc.item_name AS item_name FROM users u, party p, ticket t, purchase pc WHERE pc.user_id = u.user_id AND pc.ticket_no = t.ticket_no AND t.party_no = p.party_no AND u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id AS user_id, t.ticket_no AS ticket_no, pc.purchase_no AS purchase_no, pc.item_name AS item_name, pc.purchase_date AS purchase_date, pc.purchase_count AS purchase_count, pc.purchase_price AS purchase_price, pc.tran_code AS tran_code FROM users u, festival f, party p, ticket t, purchase pc WHERE pc.user_id = u.user_id AND pc.ticket_no = t.ticket_no AND t.festival_no = f.festival_no(+) AND t.party_no = p.party_no(+)
